intro.title: Feedback and questions
intro.example: Help us resolve any issues by choosing which type of feedback you’re providing

data content.title: Content
data content.example: Such as: That page contains a typo. That species doesn’t exist. That location seems suspect. The new URL for that organization is...
data content.annotate: This publisher has a website for handling feedback. We recommend using that
data content.contactPerMail: Get in touch with the dataset contact

bug.title: Bug
bug.example: Such as: The search button doesn’t work. The page doesn’t load. I can’t read this because the columns overlap.

idea.title: Idea
idea.example: Such as: I want links to related genetic sequence data. Show me all the open-access articles.

question.title: Helpdesk
question.example: Such as: How do you protect data on rare species? Can you help me find all records of this species occurring in international waters?
question.description: All questions are answered by our helpdesk at helpdesk@gbif.org
question.comment: For private enquiries and non technical questions you can reach us at [info@gbif.org](mailto:info@gbif.org) or at [communication@gbif.org](mailto:communication@gbif.org) for press matters.

issues.title: Content issues
issues.description: Content issues reported by other users

feedback.issueTracking: All issues are visible to the public at [Github](https://github.com/gbif/portal-feedback/issues)
feedback.failure: This isn’t good — the feedback system doesn’t work. Please send us a mail or go straight to [Github](https://github.com/gbif/portal-feedback/issues). We are sorry about the trouble.
feedback.recommendMail: We recommend sending a mail to
feedback.pleaseLogin:
Please login to leave feedback. Alternatively you can use [Github](https://github.com/gbif/portal-feedback/issues).
Why? Unfortunately we are seeing lots of spam advertisement in our feedback system if we do not require users to login.
